item.description:
Picasso at the Lapin Agile 04/19/09 To 05/08/09

Steve Martinâ€™s 1993 play Picasso at the Lapin Agile features Albert Einstein and Pablo Picasso, who meet at a bar in Montmartre, Paris. Set in 1904, both men are on the verge of an amazing ideas: Einstein will publish his special theory of relativity in 1905 and Picasso will paint Les Demoiselles d'Avignon in 1907. The men find themselves at the Lapin Agile, where they have a lengthy debate about the value of genius and talent while engaging with a host of other characters.

This is opening night so we get a great rate! Book early as I want to make sure we lock in at this price!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet before the show at a nearby restaurant tbd
item.name: Picasso at the Lapin Agile
